Description: Allows you to change the model and/or skin of anything at runtime. Its intended use is to change skins/models of monsters, players or props. Models are precached automatically.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to change model of entity specified in "Target". Every trigger use-type works uniformly. Can be kill-targeted.
Path to the new model. Is precached automatically. Path starts in "svencoop" directory.
Skin to use on target model.
Bodygroup to use on target model.
